channel.title: Turning Project 16.v6 into a PK server
channel.description: i have a GREAT server, and im using project 16, v6. how can i turn that into a PK server, so wen ur in buildings, your safe, and when ur out, your in wildy, and any1 can attack anyone.

item.title: Turning Project 16.v6 into a PK server
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

All you got to do is just search nonwild then under that it should say something like if((absx = absx = )) Something like that.

Just erase it and compile… If you get any errors then I don’t know

Note: This is very important ALWAYS make a backup. If you dont then you are screwed, and so is your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Turning Project 16.v6 into a PK server

item.description:
@XmoparscapeX wrote:

[quote=“legendzpker, post:8, topic:65073”]“try” search for nonwild and remove all the kinda cords u see[/quote] yes do that then edit it then it will be a ppk server if u realli whant help go to tut’s ull find sumic there :0
join www.freewebs.com/dillonpkz
